about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the mystical world of "Aria - The Echo of Forgotten Time," an atmospheric 2D role-playing game that takes you on an unforgettable journey through space and time. Step into the role of young Aria, a brave heroine equipped with an ancient amulet, who must change the history of her world.

(Note: The game is currently only in German.)

Main Features


    []Fascinating Time-Travel Story: Follow Aria, a young woman who discovers an ancient amulet with the power to lead her through various eras. Each era holds its own challenges and secrets waiting to be unveiled.[]Character Development and Moral Choices: Aria's decisions influence the story's development. Every choice has consequences, and there is no clear "good" or "evil."[]Vibrant, Changing Game World: Discover a world that responds to the player's actions. NPC characters have their routines, and the environment changes dynamically.[]Strategic Combat System: A turn-based combat system challenges players to think tactically and use character abilities wisely.[]Exploration of Side Stories: Side quests offer deep insights into the world and its inhabitants and can influence the main story.[]Atmospheric Music and Sound: An adaptive soundtrack and detailed sound effects enhance the immersion in Aria's world.[]Beautiful Illustrations: This game is complemented by illustrations that artistically highlight memories and moments.[]Multiple Endings: Experience a variety of possible endings, influenced by the moral decisions and actions you take during the game.[]German Voice Acting: We have decided to give the main characters their own voices to enhance your gaming experience.[]Day-Night System: The game adapts to the current time of day and highlights it with visual effects. Transitions occur dynamically. Depending on the time of day, different tasks, enemies, and NPCs await you.
  • Crafting System: Create potions, special items, and weapons from found resources. You can find useful resources all over the world.
